  • Method Details

    • DrawCircles

      public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage DrawCircles​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage mapImage, int mapWidth, int mapHeight, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> values)
      Uses the provided map image and country coordinates to draw circles

      Takes the country analysis data and draws red circles on each country in the list, with a larger circle for a large values and returns the modified image

      Parameters:
      mapImage - The unmodified imape of the world map to be modified
      mapWidth - The width of the map, in pixels
      mapHeight - The height of the map, in pixels
      values - The list of analysis values for each country
      Returns:
      the modified image with circles now drawn on it

    • getXY

      public static java.awt.Point getXY​(double lat, double lng, int mapWidth, int mapHeight)
      Calculates the pixel position of a country

      Takes the latitude and longitude coordinates of a country and calculates the pixel position of that country on the map image

      Parameters:
      lat - The latitude coordinate of the country
      lng - The longitude coordinate of the country
      mapWidth - The width of the map, in pixels
      mapHeight - The height of the map, in pixels
      Returns:
      the x and y pixel coordinates of the country
